xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/723314-Ecuador vs. el resto del mundo 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4z9Xa6vUpVs50Vf7nYz2W3sECVz.jpg November 7th, 2001. After a seventy years absence, the Ecuadorian national soccer team is close to qualifying for the first time to a Soccer World Cup. This documentary follows the events that took place during that historic date, when a whole country lived under the shadow of a soccer game. Ecuador vs. el resto del mundo
